house_listing.house_description: Move right in! 2 bedrms and cozy den downstairs. L/r with f/p. Loft for home office. Kitchen with bar and breakfast area. 3 skylights, 2 balconies. Mint condition. Garage, outside shower and storage shed.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Barn, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings,Ceiling Fan(s), Contemporary Style, Fenced, Foyer, Office, Skylights,Storage Space, Utility Room, Wet Bar
